thread.section_title: LOLA Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LOLA | mylola.com
thread.title: Michelle Vyvjala

author: Michelle Vyvjala
title: Michelle Vyvjala
text:
I am beyond happy to have discovered LOLA! It is so amazing to have a wonderful product and I don't have to leave the house, it comes to me!
The most amazing part of LOLA, is that I know that no chemicals are going to be in my body and I know all the ingredients that are in the products.
The online ordering was super easy, they walk you through each step! The choosing process of how many you need of what type was completely customizable. The shipping was on time and notification on when my package was on it way!
Thank you for making my time of the month that much easier!
